titleStmt.title: Manuscript of "A Room of One's Own"
titleStmt.author: Virginia Woolf

publicationStmt.p: Publicly available from University of Cambridge's Digital Library.

sourceDesc.p: Archived manuscript pages of "A Room of One's Own" from University of Cambridge's Digital Library.

projectDesc.p: TEI encoding of selected manuscript pages from Virginia Woolf's "A Room of One's Own", as archived by University of Cambridge's Digital Library.

figure.head: Manuscript Page 1 of "A Room of One's Own"

graphic.url: Manuscript Page 1 of A Room of One's Own.jpg

figure.figDesc: This manuscript page represents an early draft of "A Room of One's Own". It shows Virginia Woolf starting and restarting sentences. The original image is available at .

figure.head: Manuscript Page 2 of "A Room of One's Own"

graphic.url: Manuscript Page 2 of A Room of One's Own.jpg

figure.figDesc: This page continues the narrative development from the previous manuscript leaf. The writer was adding revisions and new ideas between the lines, in the margins, and on the blank pages. The original image is available at
